meta.title: About
meta.description: Who is Simon and what has he done in tech leadership

bio.title: Who Is Simon?
bio.subtitle: Professional leader in technology
paragraphs: Born in Russia in the decade of the sunsetting of the Soviet Union, Simon spent his formative years in technical environments.
Simon embodies deep technical expertise and strategic leadership, connecting technology with business outcomes.

meta.title: About
meta.description: Who is Simon and how he guides entrepreneurs to success

bio.title: Who Is Simon?
bio.subtitle: It's time to unveil the person behind the name
paragraphs: Born in Russia in the decade of the sunsetting of the Soviet Union, Simon spent his formative years in creative environments.
Simon embodies the idealistic age of yore and the pragmatic fast-paced new era of rapidly developing technology.
